name: WebGL2RenderingContext.fenceSync
description: The WebGL2RenderingContext.fenceSync() method of the WebGL 2 API creates a new WebGLSync object and inserts it into the GL command stream.

refs.name: WebGL 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'fenceSync' in the 'WebGL 2.0' specification.
